q1: Is Cristiano Ronaldo still a forward for Juventus?
a1: Yes, i think he will play forward up top along side Paulo Dybala.  I think he will get to play where he wants and this is his most favored position.
q2: Of course, he is still in great shape and is a natural goal scorer.
a2: What could he do to become a trained goal scorer?
q3: Ronaldo is already a trained goal scorer. He practices very hard.
a3: Ronaldo continues to do a great job with Juventus
q4: Do the Juventus fans love Ronoldo?
a4: No Juventus is a character all his own.
